summary: Robert's wife is divorcing him for gambling etc. A strip club owner offers him work redesigning his club. Robert befriends a dancer there, who has premonitions.
cast: Martin Donovan|Daniel Edwards|Richard Schiff|Joanna Going|Patrick Malahide|Karl Urban|Michael Langley|Jeremy Birchall|Clint Sharplin|Barry Spring|Jon Brazier|Dean Stewart|Jane Fullerton-Smith|Jean Hyland|Valerie Williams|Kirsty Brown|Samantha Keen|Darren Taylor|Vanessa Green|Asa Lindh|James Cross|Leonard Sipili|Andrew Losefa|Joy Watson|Johnny Bond|Nicholas Hayward|Tania Anderson|Kate Walsh|Christine Cottle|Sally-Ann Brown|Ajay Vasisht
title: Heaven
